divs: Sighting DetailsEnglish: A silver disc that appeared at January 2nd 2013 at 1:21 p.m. from my view in NE and flew a straigt line to south. Out of the perspective from the object it moved from north to south. Sometimes it disappeared behind some clouds, but re-appeared after some seconds. It was very slow in the beginning, but then it speeded up and disappeared behind the clouds. In the first 20 seconds it flew very slow, but then it speeded up faster than a plane or heli. I think it was approxmiately 50 to 100 feet in diameter. One witness saw it clearly with me with identical observations, who saw it at first. I had no time to look for my camera.
